name: test_e2e_with_logs[021_SQLI_TIME_012]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_TIME_012` |
| **Name** | Mixed case sleep function |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | time_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |
